source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Introduction to KeyShot for Digital 3d Rendering

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: Learn to unleash the potential of this powerful 3d rendering software to make your 3d assets shine!
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of KeyShot and use it to create stunning renders of your 3d content.
Learn to navigate the UI and import your own game assets

items.title: VFX Basics: Moving from After Effects to Nuke

visible_instructors.title: Vicki Lau
visible_instructors.name: Vicki
visible_instructors.job_title: Multi-Hyphenate Artist, VFX Pro, TEDx Speaker, Author

items.headline: Step-by-step guide to transitioning your visual effects compositing skills from After Effects to Nuke.
objectives_summary: Know what, when and how to navigate and use basic nodes in Nuke
Understand the functional differences between After Effects and Nuke
Translate compositing skills from After Effects to do compositing with industry software Nuke

items.title: Pixologics ZBrush 2019 The Basics FREE COURSE
items.headline: Learn the very basics of ZBrush so you can confidently follow courses
objectives_summary: Learning Zbrush basics beginners course

items.title: Create a Rowboat Mechanism Using Siemens Solid Edge
items.headline: Mechanical Design - Learn How to Create and 3D Print a Prototype Rowboat Using Siemens Solid Edge
objectives_summary: At the end of my course students will have created all the parts used in the rowboat mechanism, created the assembly and added motion.

items.title: Learn to Make Animated Presentations with Avatars
items.headline: Create professionally animated presentations & marketing videos by quickly animating comic and photo-realistic avatars.
objectives_summary: Users will be able to create comic and photo-realistic avatars
Create instant facial and body animations
Export animations by copy & pasting them as animated GIFS for use in PowerPoints, Keynote, Google Docs, Evernote or any other presentation tools

items.title: Puppet Pin Rigging in After Effects
items.headline: Animate 2D cartoon characters in After Effects!
objectives_summary: Rig and animate 2D characters using the base Puppet Pin Tool

items.title: Learn Sheet Metal Design
items.headline: Complete and Automated Sheet Metal Design in Solid Edge
objectives_summary: Create Sheet metal parts and flat patterns.  Develop Sheet Metal models with fewer steps. Built sheet metal parts around an assembly.

items.title: Paint and Roto for Feature Film VFX 01
items.headline: Marker Removal in Nuke
objectives_summary: Have confidence in knowing what to expect in the industry.
Students will be able to complete marker removal and other basic paint tasks to feature film standard using tried and tested methods.
Denoise and regrain plates, remove markers, bring back foreground objects, 2D tracking, 3D Projections, Edge Fixing.

items.title: Give your illustrator files motion with After Effects
items.headline: Let's turn those illustrator files into amazing motion graphics videos with After Effects.
objectives_summary: Animate illustrations from logos to characters.
Organize assets in a proper manner to make animations.
Achieve the most appropriate render settings for social media.

visible_instructors.job_title: Engaged and Passionate PowerPoint & After Effects instructor

items.headline: Create a real-life After Effects project and use it for your videos! Learn After Effects basics along the way!
objectives_summary: Create a video reveal transition in After Effects
Know a little about Adobe After Effects
Learn a real life project, complete a full workflow

items.title: Create Instant Facial Animations & 3D Heads
items.headline: Quickly create professional-level, facial animations with no prior experience.
objectives_summary: Create custom 3D Heads
Generate lip-sync animations
Create facial expression animations

items.title: Design and Animate a Vintage Badge in After Effects
items.headline: A Project-Based walk thru on creating and animating a vintage badge, finished with snow and sound effects!
objectives_summary: create a badge or logo from a drawing
be able to take Illustrator files and work with them in After Effects
understand organization techniques in Illustrator and After Effects that will give their work scalability

items.title: Running a 3D Modeling/Animation Business
items.headline: Turning your talent in 3D into an income for you is possible as a freelancer or (even better) as a small business owner.
objectives_summary: Understand how to turn your talent into money
Create an outstanding brand and platform
Find better clients with bigger projects

items.title: Game Asset Creation With Houdini
items.headline: Season 2.5
objectives_summary: Learn to create a series of procedural game assets in Houdini

items.title: Generate 3D Facial Animations: Motion Capture for Everyone
items.headline: Create professional-level, 3D facial animations with a PC webcam, without any prior experience.
objectives_summary: Understand iClone & the Faceware Facial Motion Capture tool
Calibrate the Facial Motion Capture tool
Understand system limitations and best practices

items.title: Structural Frame Design & Weldments Using Solid Edge 3D CAD
items.headline: Design Rigid Frame Structures  for Machinery and Process Equipment - Creo - Solidworks - Fusion 360 - AutoCad - Blender
objectives_summary: Use Siemens Solid Edge to create Structural Frames and Weldments;  Create the Frame Skeleton; Build the 3D Frame; Create Drawings with cut lists;  Build a Variety of Metal Frames, Place on a Drawing Sheet, Add Weldments
